ci_support_linux_64_.yaml:
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
python_min:
- '3.12'

about.description:
Particula is a Python-based aerosol particle simulator. Its goal is to
provide a robust aerosol simulation (including both gas and particle phases)
that can be used to answer scientific questions arising from experiments and research endeavors.
about.summary: a simple, fast, and powerful particle simulator

commands: pytest -W error -W "ignore::pytest.PytestUnknownMarkWarning" -m "not slow and not performance"

about.description:
Particula is a Python-based aerosol particle simulator. Its goal is to
provide a robust aerosol simulation (including both gas and particle phases)
that can be used to answer scientific questions arising from experiments and research endeavors.
about.summary: a simple, fast, and powerful particle simulator

commands: pytest -W error -W "ignore::pytest.PytestUnknownMarkWarning" -m "not slow and not performance"

name: particula
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "0.2.11" %}

package:
  name: particula
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://github.com/uncscode/particula/archive/refs/tags/v{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: add2bbfcba3f99765f8c119fb6672bb880f9db83e7f081a936dbcf8e453f06d2

build:
  number: 0
  noarch: python
  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv

requirements:
  host:
    - python {{ python_min }}
    - pip
    - flit-core >=3.2,<4
  run:
    - typing_extensions >=4.0.0
    - python >={{ python_min }}
    - numpy >=2.0.0
    - scipy >=1.12

test:
  requires:
    - python {{ python_min }}
    - pytest
    - pip
  source_files:
    - particula
  commands:
    - pip check
    - python -c "import particula; print(particula.__version__)"
    - pytest -W error -W "ignore::pytest.PytestUnknownMarkWarning" -m "not slow and not performance"

about:
  home: https://uncscode.github.io/particula
  license: MIT
  license_family: MIT
  license_file: license
  summary: a simple, fast, and powerful particle simulator
  description: |
    Particula is a Python-based aerosol particle simulator. Its goal is to
    provide a robust aerosol simulation (including both gas and particle phases)
    that can be used to answer scientific questions arising from experiments and research endeavors.
  dev_url: https://github.com/uncscode/particula
  doc_url: https://uncscode.github.io/particula/

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - gorkowski
    - ngam
    - mahf708
